java/liquibase/exception/ValidationFailedException.java

00001 package liquibase.exception;
00002 
00003 import liquibase.ChangeSet;
00004 import liquibase.parser.visitor.ValidatingVisitor;
00005 import liquibase.preconditions.FailedPrecondition;
00006 import liquibase.util.StreamUtil;
00007 
00008 import java.io.PrintStream;
00009 import java.util.List;
00010 import java.util.Set;
00011 import java.util.ArrayList;
00012 
00013 public class ValidationFailedException extends MigrationFailedException {
00014 
00015     private static final long serialVersionUID = 1L;
00016     
00017     private List<ChangeSet> invalidMD5Sums;
00018     private List<FailedPrecondition> failedPreconditions;
00019     private Set<ChangeSet> duplicateChangeSets;
00020     private List<SetupException> setupExceptions;
00021     private List<InvalidChangeDefinitionException> changeValidationExceptions;
00022 
00023     public ValidationFailedException(ValidatingVisitor changeLogHandler) {
00024         this.invalidMD5Sums = changeLogHandler.getInvalidMD5Sums();
00025         this.failedPreconditions = changeLogHandler.getFailedPreconditions();
00026         this.duplicateChangeSets = changeLogHandler.getDuplicateChangeSets();
00027         this.setupExceptions = changeLogHandler.getSetupExceptions();
00028         this.changeValidationExceptions = changeLogHandler.getChangeValidationExceptions();
00029     }
00030 
00031 
00032     public String getMessage() {
00033         StringBuffer message = new StringBuffer();
00034         message.append("Validation Failed:").append(StreamUtil.getLineSeparator());
00035         if (invalidMD5Sums.size() > 0) {
00036             message.append("     ").append(invalidMD5Sums.size()).append(" change sets check sum").append(StreamUtil.getLineSeparator());
00037             for (int i=0; i< invalidMD5Sums.size(); i++) {
00038                 if (i > 25) {
00039                     break;
00040                 }
00041                 ChangeSet invalid = invalidMD5Sums.get(i);
00042                 message.append("          ").append(invalid.toString(true));
00043                 message.append(StreamUtil.getLineSeparator());
00044             }
00045         }
00046         if (failedPreconditions.size() > 0) {
00047             message.append("     ").append(failedPreconditions.size()).append(" preconditions failed").append(StreamUtil.getLineSeparator());
00048             for (FailedPrecondition invalid : failedPreconditions) {
00049                 message.append("     ").append(invalid.toString());
00050                 message.append(StreamUtil.getLineSeparator());
00051             }
00052         }
00053         if (duplicateChangeSets.size() > 0) {
00054             message.append("     ").append(duplicateChangeSets.size()).append(" change sets had duplicate identifiers").append(StreamUtil.getLineSeparator());
00055             for (ChangeSet invalid : duplicateChangeSets) {
00056                 message.append("          ").append(invalid.toString(false));
00057                 message.append(StreamUtil.getLineSeparator());
00058             }
00059         }
00060         if(setupExceptions.size() >0){
00061             message.append("     ").append(setupExceptions.size()).append(" changes have failures").append(StreamUtil.getLineSeparator());
00062             for (SetupException invalid : setupExceptions) {
00063                 message.append("          ").append(invalid.toString());
00064                 message.append(StreamUtil.getLineSeparator());                
00065             }
00066         }
00067         if(changeValidationExceptions.size() >0){
00068             message.append("     ").append(changeValidationExceptions.size()).append(" changes have validation failures").append(StreamUtil.getLineSeparator());
00069             for (InvalidChangeDefinitionException invalid : changeValidationExceptions) {
00070                 message.append("          ").append(invalid.toString());
00071                 message.append(StreamUtil.getLineSeparator());
00072             }
00073         }
00074 
00075         return message.toString();
00076     }
00077 
00078     public List<ChangeSet> getInvalidMD5Sums() {
00079         return invalidMD5Sums;
00080     }
00081 
00082     public void printDescriptiveError(PrintStream out) {
00083         out.println("Validation Error: ");
00084         if (invalidMD5Sums.size() > 0) {
00085             out.println("     "+invalidMD5Sums.size()+" change sets have changed since they were ran against the database");
00086             for (ChangeSet changeSet : invalidMD5Sums) {
00087                 out.println("          "+changeSet.toString(false));
00088             }
00089         }
00090 
00091         if (failedPreconditions.size() > 0) {
00092             out.println("     "+failedPreconditions.size()+" preconditions failed");
00093             for (FailedPrecondition failedPrecondition : failedPreconditions) {
00094                 out.println("          "+failedPrecondition.toString());
00095             }
00096         }
00097 
00098         if (duplicateChangeSets.size() > 0) {
00099             out.println("     "+duplicateChangeSets.size()+" change sets had duplicate identifiers");
00100             for (ChangeSet duplicate : duplicateChangeSets) {
00101                 out.println("          "+duplicate.toString(false));
00102             }
00103         }
00104         
00105         if(setupExceptions.size() >0) {
00106             out.println("     "+setupExceptions.size()+" changes had errors");
00107             for (SetupException setupEx : setupExceptions) {
00108                 out.println("          "+setupEx.getMessage());
00109             }
00110         }
00111     }
00112 }
